verses.roman:
āge tāṅre mili' sabe tāṅre saṅge lañā
tāṅra saṅge jagannātha dekhibena giyā

synonyms: āge—first; tāṅre—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mili'—meeting; sabe—all the devotees; tāṅre—Him; saṅge—with them; lañā—taking; tāṅra saṅge—with Him; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; dekhibena—they will see; giyā—going.
translation: "First the devotees will meet Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and then take Him with them to the temple to see Lord Jagannātha."
